shortDescription: Property Status Enterprise Migration & DXF Viewer Enhancements - Final consolidation with 487 lines removed
problem: Legacy statuses.ts (152 lines) and scattered property status handling needed complete enterprise migration and DXF viewer professional tools enhancement
cause: Final enterprise consolidation phase requiring complete property status migration and professional drawing interface capabilities
filesChanged: src/subapps/dxf-viewer/ (overlay types, color mapping, toolbar enhancements)
src/subapps/geo-canvas/ (professional drawing interface, property status manager)

solution.phase1: Property status enterprise migration - Deleted legacy statuses.ts (152 lines) and migrated all property status handling to property-statuses-enterprise.ts
solution.phase2: DXF viewer professional tools - Enhanced overlay types, color mapping, draggable toolbar, and layers settings for enterprise CAD functionality
solution.phase3: Geo-Canvas drawing interface - Implemented professional drawing interface with property status manager for real estate applications
solution.phase4: Enterprise ID migration system - Created dedicated migration controller with 117 lines of enterprise migration logic
solution.phase5: Global error handling integration - Added GlobalErrorSetup component integrated with layout.tsx for comprehensive error tracking

testing: Git operations tested successfully, TypeScript compilation verified, Vercel deployment completed, property status migration functioning with DXF viewer enhancements
notes: Final enterprise migration completion: 1) Complete property status consolidation with legacy statuses.ts removal (152 lines), 2) Professional DXF viewer tools with enhanced overlay management and color mapping, 3) Geo-Canvas professional drawing interface for real estate property management, 4) Enterprise ID migration system with dedicated controller for scalable data handling, 5) Comprehensive global error handling integration across the entire application.
relatedBackups: 2025-12-19 - Enterprise Safety Checkpoint with obligations consolidation
2025-12-20 - Massive Modular Architecture & Design Tokens Integration
2025-12-20 - Complete Date Formatting Consolidation & Enterprise Standardization
